item.title: Building rgdal from source
item.description: My limited knowledge of what happens in Terminal, and thus by extension shell, is mostly driven by PostgreSQL/PostGID/rgdal/RPostgreSQL install errors. In the latest variant of this, rgdal throws the following error when attempting to build from source:
